title: Strengthening Social Sector Job Competencies through Cost-Effective Curriculum Design and Team-Based Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social science concepts and less than one year of practical experience
context.additional_context: Learning Environment Emphasizing Project-Based Assessment and Team Collaboration to Improve Task Application for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design plans for utilizing Open Educational Resources (OER) to reduce textbook costs by 30% or more.
Through team-based collaboration, learners can develop five or more microlearning contents in social studies and conduct peer reviews.
Learners can complete a portfolio of textbook replacement solutions applicable to real-world work environments through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
